data.content: Genera un top-level con un item de presentación, un item de preguntas y respuestas y un item para pedir una pizza. Genera SOLO el top-level.

Here is the complete Taskyto YAML content for the top-level module as per your request. It includes an item for presentation, an item for questions and answers, and an item for ordering a pizza.

```yaml
# -----> File: top_level.yaml <-----
modules:
- name: top-level
  kind: menu
  presentation: |
    Welcome to our pizza ordering chatbot! Here you can ask questions about our menu or place an order for your favorite pizza.
  fallback: I'm sorry, I did not get what you said. Can you rephrase?

  items:
  - title: Pizza Q&A
    kind: module
    reference: pizza_qa
  - title: Order a pizza
    kind: module
    reference: order_pizza
  - title: Welcome message
    kind: answer
    answer: |
      Hello! I'm here to assist you with your pizza orders. What would you like to do today?
```

Make sure to replace `order_pizza` with the actual reference to your pizza ordering module when you create it. Let me know if you need further assistance!
